title: Stadio Vanni Sanna
text: Stadio Vanni Sanna (formerly known as Stadio Acquedotto) is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Sassari">Sassari</a>, Italy. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="Sassari%20Torres">S.E.F. Torres 1903</a> and <a href="U.S.D.%20Latte%20Dolce">U.S.D. Latte Dolce</a>. The stadium holds 12,000.
